question: Does CIDEB mutation protect from liver disease?
ideal_answer: Yes. CIDEB mutation protects from liver disease.

snippets.text: Germline Mutations in CIDEB and Protection against Liver Disease.
We also found that variants in CIDEB, which encodes a structural protein found in hepatic lipid droplets, had a protective effect.
CONCLUSIONS: Rare germline mutations in CIDEB conferred substantial protection from liver disease.
